p: Compared to the LSGP right before VOM stimulation, the shorten duration of ERP was less in LSPV (98.6 ± 9.0ms vs.124.3 ± 12.7ms, p < 0.001), LIPV (98.6 ± 13.5 ms vs. 114.3 ± 15.1 ms, p = 0.140), and LAA (88.6 ± 21.2 ms vs. 110.0 ± 17.3 ms, p = 0.183), when LSGP combined with low-level VOM stimulation ( Figure 5). Similarly, the ERP dispersion was hardly increased (0.13 ± 0.03). However, the WOV at LSPV (8.6 ± 6.90 ms), LIPV (11.4 ± 6.90 ms), and LAA (11.4 ± 6.90) were less prolonged with low-level stimulation in VOM.
